name: pm3.44
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))

stmt.origin: jaao(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1), w0, w2, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(w2, w1))

|- wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))
-| wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(w2, w1))
|- wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))

comment: Theorem *3.44 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 113. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2005.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Oct-2013.)
